text: this place deserves minus stars, burger is awful place is filth went twice horrible is kind , contacted corporate they do not give a damn....this franchise should fail

If whoever owns this franchise really cares about protecting the Fatburger brand, they'll dump the crew that was working late morning on Saturday, 1/25.  My wife and I walked in and were immediately jolted by the loud, thumping dance music being played on the house system.  What?!?!  Photos of everybody from Miles Davis to T-bone Walker on the walls, and you're playing this crap?  It got worse.  We ordered at the counter, and while we were waiting another couple came in, ordered, and then sat outside to wait for their food.  We watched the young woman who took the orders deliver food to them, and suspected that she had given them our order.  sure enough, a couple minutes later, counter girl came to our table and said "I'm sorry, I accidentally gave them your order."  Really easy to see how confusing it could have been with a total of four people in the entire place!  When our food did arrive, I found a puddle of grease at the bottom of my order of half-cooked onion rings.
Sad.  I like Fatburger (and part of the reason is the music selection).  but the unsupervised kids who were working that day found a way to make it a really crappy experience.
Worst Fatburger I have ever experienced.  Food was incorrect and took forever. Cashier was amazing and doing jobs for four other people while the rest were messing everything up. Will not come back.

By far the worst burger i've ever eaten in 30 years. 
It's 11pm, myself and 6 other guys walk in. The front doors were open, it's sweltering hot inside(did i mention it was 11pm?). The side door by the outside patio was propped open by a broomstick sticking out across the sidewalk(lawsuit waiting to happen)...

We each order the "XXL" with egg and bacon, chilli cheese fries and a drink 
($17 ?!?). 
After 15-20min, our order came out in a standard greasy brown paper lunchbag.

First bite: too much mustard, relish is very sour, patty is burnt around the edges.
I tried eating about 1/3rd of the patty alone, then threw everything out.

Wish I would have gone to one of the burger chains instead for $7.
Next time head to In N' Out and come home satisfied.
Night crew sitting around too lazy to work. Why is the open sign on at midnight?  Why are posted hours till 1am. Bad franchise owner obviously doesn't care
Yum! I love the Turkey Burgers here!! The food is always great and service is incredible. Totally worth paying $12 for a turkey combo.

Burgers are excellent with a lot of condiments to choose from. However...there's always a decent wait and they're pretty expensive. Overpriced in my opinion but I'll definitely be going back next payday lol.

DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY!!

This place is a joke.  You pick what size of over-priced hamburger patty you want.  $5 to $10 for a fast food burger? Really?!?!?

When I pulled into this place, there was a blue car at the drive thru window.  I pulled up to the speaker to order and was told "Just a minute."   5 minutes later, the order taker graced me with her presence and I gave my order.  I pulled up and the blue car was still there!  I waited another 4-5 minutes and just pulled out of the drive thru and left.  The exact same thing happened about a year ago when I first tried this location.  

I will never, ever go to Fatburger again.  Terrible service.  Over-priced food and an overall lack of caring.  

F-

Stay Away!

I ordered a lo carb burger WRAPPED in Lettuce with other assorted topping s  - Received assorted toppings NOT wrapped in lettuce , in fact lettuceless .

Ordered 2 small burgers for my kids cheese only - received 2 small burgers with the works .

it's NOT rocket science it just take a little PRIDE to do that job right .  Mind you I was the ONLY customer in the drive-through and NO cars in the lot .    Now I have 2 STILL hungry kids and basically a meatloaf I have to eat with a fork and knife .  Won't be going back .

If 5 guys only had a drive through !
I came in as a stop from cali with my girlfriend. The satff was excellent!!! The girl with the tats were really friendly. Loved the food thank you!!
I typically use the drive-thru and can expect to wait about 5-10 minutes before I get my burger combo and go. The food has always been good and worth the wait.

If you went to Fatburger in L.A. like I used to,you will likely be a bit disappointed. The charm and funky atmosphere have somehow been lost here. 

Pluses: The food is always good. Being able to add an egg or make your order custom is a welcome change. The menu is deliberately limited. This means their core products are spot on and well made. 

Minuses: The current pricing structure leaves a lot to be desired. $20 for 2 people to have burgers and fries is quite steep. The jukebox is gone,but some retro music is still played. Do not be in a hurry here, however long it takes for the food to arrive,is how long it will take. 

Summary: There are a lot of good burger places out there,and many of them are a better value.

This location has some of the best burgers and we have eaten here a few times now. Most of the staff is always really friendly. This time we ate the person named Shannon took my order and seemed very standoffish and not friendly. Should have a better attitude - rest of the staff like I said is very friendly in the afternoon. She wouldn't even look at you while taking the order.

This location is so dirty, i felt sick after eating here.  There was no toilet paper or hand soap in the bathroom...what do they wash their hands with??!!! Just threw up in my mouth thinking of their filthy hands on my burger. Not to mention the sink hasn't been scrubbed in months.  The floors in the restaurant were filthy, along with the windows and walls.  Is there no manager on site?? If there is, you need to find a new career. You have no idea how to run a business.  I'm betting it's not long before they get shut down by the health dept.  DO NOT eat here for your own good!

Definitely wouldn't recommend this place. Right after I ordered, a guy wanted his money back and had a huge hair hanging from his burger. NASTY!!! I asked for my money back too, it disgusted me so much. Not only that, the service was sooooooooo slow.

There is good reason that this joint only has 2.5 out 5 stars for 53 reviews not counting mine: They suck!

I ordered a chocolate shake. At the wonder I was told the total was $4.75. Really? A full dollar more than the already overpriced menu? The guy says, "oh yah, we're waiting for corporate to send us an updated menu" uh... well isn't that called false advertising?

I wasn't in the mood to argue, the thought crossed my mind to just drive off but I went ahead and overpaid. Should have just driven away, worst, liquid, overpriced shake ever. 

Lesson learned, if you are going to have diet cheat treat, go to in n out and pay half for a MUCH better shake. 

This will be the final time I ever give Fatburger my business. They have failed to impress me every time I have tried them with their service (or lack therof), prices or food. I'm sure they'll go out of business soon.

Place is nice, but the prices aren't really worth it in comparison even to other burger places. There's also a couple traps to be careful of, like how the thousand island fatburger is 7.19, but you can get a medium for 5.19 and get a free addon of thousand island. The service is nice, but the prices themselves are almost deterrents on their own. The food does take longer to get, but it seems to be for quality, so I'm fine with it. In summary, pricier but higher quality, careful of the traps.

Went through the drive thru a later day, and their drive thru sign's prices are unreadable, which is a pretty big problem.

Won't be returning. At least to this location or until they can find a competent person to work the counter and take orders. It's really not that difficult of a job but for some reason the woman at cash register couldn't seem to be able to process what I was trying to order. First strike, out of fat fries. Then, she wrang my order in wrong so I had to reorder missing items. Next, a man who ordered was given his food but informed the cook he hadn't paid yet so he had to wait for the woman to come from the back so he could pay and take his food. The cook told her he needed to pay cause his food was ready and she instead of taking care of him proceeded to make a milk shake. Then the plain cheeseburger I ordered for my son came out with chili on it which I only ordered on the side. So we had to wait for the burger to be remade. As we are eating right now I notice that all they've done to " fix" his burger was wipe the chili of and re-grill it. In total I was in there for 25 min.  Fatburger, please get rid of this incompetent worker and rehire someone who has at least half a brain. Very frustrating!!

If you get here and there are more than two people in line in front of you, don't expect to order for at least 10 minutes.  It took the cashier forever to enter the order into a computer and you have to speak slow and repeat it several times.  If you order a shake, she will make it before taking the next order in line.  

After we finally ordered, it took 20 minutes to get our burgers!  We were told the fries were taking longer to cook and would be a few minutes.  The burgers were good, but they had started to cool off by this point.  I had ordered the new Thousand Island Burger, they had apparently forgot that small detail.  It took so long to get this one that I didn't even bother having them redo it.

The fries arrived 8 minutes later and were slightly undercooked.  They were done, but not crispy yet.  you could tell right away because they were not that golden brown color.  We had ordered 3 orders of fat fries,  but she brought two fat and one skinny fries.  She told us that she gave us what was available and didn't want us to wait any longer.  She dropped the platter on the table and walked away.  I guess we did better than other people who ordered onion rings, they got the same skinny fries and were told that there was something wrong with the onion rings and that's all they had.  I guess the other people figured the same thing, the wait was so long why even bother fighting it.  The staff didn't even bother offering a refund for the extra dollar it costs for the onion rings!

The meal was ok, but not worth the 30 minutes it took to get part of the order.  The last straw was when my wife pointed out the water stained roof tiles above us.  They were painted black, but now some of the tiles had obvious water damage and one even looked like it had white mold growing on it.

I don't ever expect to be coming back, there are just too many choices out there, especially at their prices!

Shittiest service I've ever received in my entire life. Two female Mexican workers took 35 minutes making A SALAD and kept talking amongst themselves complaining about other customers and rolled their eyes at me when I looked at them. All they did was complain and chatter to themselves. I'm here right now, still waiting on that salad....
I love fat burger. I get a Medium with cheese, eggs, bacon with fat fries and a sprite. I get indigestion for 2 days after. Come hungry.

This is the third time I show up to this place and no one is to be seen in the morning I work grave yard so a good burger after work is what I want but they can't give it to me. Don't claim 24 hours you freaking retards!!

I've come here three times now & I haven't even been able to eat anything.... why? Bc the asshats that work there never even acknowledged my existence in the drive thru!!!! I never got to place an order. I have a low tolerance for bullshit & this place is straight bullshit. Never again.

I am genuinely the most easiest person to please. I always drove past this location and asked myself, "Why have I NOT tried this place yet?" 
 
We stood in line waiting to order and there was this elderly women in front of us who obviously was trying her best to take an order being it was her first time too, the cashier lady immediately got frustrated and scold the lady to pick up the tone of her voice because she couldn't hear her order.  
If that wasn't rude enough a drive thru asked for her assistants and she snapped at them telling them that she's occupied, "Hold Up!"

Then it was my turn to order. I gave her the benefit of the doubt and did my best to order... I decided on a medium burger, and she rudely told me... "you mean the beef medium burger?" Long story short because I don't want to write an essay...

If she didn't love her job find a new one... or if she was having a bad day? Take a moment to go and breath. There should be no reason for her to mistreat her guest. Especially when you never know who that guest could be. 

Food came out, we noticed she missed a lot of things we requested.... disappointed because the food was actually tastey.

I bought food via drive-through because my peeps and I had a late night craving to satisfy. I thought their name sounded honest and drove there to check it out. 

We ordered the classic Fat burger with a  shake, a western burger, and onion rings. I liked my burger well enough but it wasn't by any means dazzling. My friend said her western burger (not super sure the exact name of the burger) was okay. The onion rings held up well during the ride home and stayed crispy. The best part was the shake which was thick and creamy. 

I would likely hit it up again for casual dining. It's a solid 3.5 stars but I can't give that. They'll have to deal with a 3. I forgot to take pictures this time, maybe next time!

On November 1st at 6:15 PM I went through your drive thru at the Flamingo and Rainbow location in Las Vegas Nevada. My family went to this location because after shopping at Smith's Food and Drug we received a coupon for a free medium fatburger with the purchase of a combo meal. The coupon has an expiration date of 12-31-2015 and is not the only coupon on the receipt tape. Upon ordering about $16 worth of food I mentioned the coupon. The woman working the drive thru asked if I had the whole receipt. I said no , I clipped your coupon. She said she won't take it because she needs to see the date on my receipt. I asked why since there is an expiration date for the Fatburger coupon and dots signifying to "clip" the coupon. The coupon doesn't mention that the whole receipt needs to be present for the offer. The coupon is also on a roll with other coupons for non affiliated businesses. Fatburger are you telling me that if I want to use your coupon I better use it before I use the other coupons? If I had eaten at Brooksy's the week before And their coupon was gone you wouldn't honor your coupon since the original receipt isn't intact? Your restaurant was dead and your drive thru empty. Are you really in a position to turn away coupons you personally put out? Hopefully this is the mistake of a poorly trained employee. I wouldn't doubt it considering when we ordered a number 1 combo (exact words) she asked if we wanted to make it a combo! I've never been a huge fan of Fatburger since this location seems to lack any sort of customer service.
Like the new remodel and I don't know what everyone is complaining about long wait times. All fat burgers take a little time. The food is always good and fresh and staff is friendly

Ordered through ubereats at 8:08pm expected arrival time 8:27pm...well that was a fail! Reordered again , expected time 8:41pm and it was still a big fail!!!! Ordered a turkey burger, specifically marked what I want on my sandwich and still a fail!!! Crap! Never going to this pace anymore! Great driver but not the delivery time.

I've never written a review on Yelp, but this place compelled me to write my first one.

This place gave me a severe case of the stomach flu. 

I've never tried Fatburger in my life. So earlier today I was craving for a burger and passed by this one and saw it as a good opportunity to try one. Horrible experience. 

First, the food here was ridiculously overpriced. Call me cheap, but I consider paying close to $15 for a burger, a drink, and onion rings grossly overpriced. Secondly, the girl that took my order got my order wrong and didn't even give me the fries I ordered. Third, the girl that gave me my food first asked me if I wanted ketchup, to which I replied "yes please", and then proceeded to hand me a bag of food that I later found out contained no ketchup whatsoever. Fourth, the food itself was quite mediocre, at best. The burger was dry, and the onion rings were drenched in oil and tasted more like oily onions than onion rings. The only decent thing was the sweet green tea.

Lastly, and this is the major one, this place gave me gastroenteritis. For those who don't know what this is, it's the stomach flu. How do I know it was Fatburger's fault? because it was the first and only thing I ate today, and I didn't even have dinner last night. It started with some major diarrhea, led to severe stomach cramps, and ended with me in the ER at 3 in the morning. I can almost guarantee you that Fatburger either didn't cook or wash the meat thoroughly or some part of the food was contaminated. 

If you don't like expensive burgers, getting your orders wrong, dry burgers, oily onion rings, diarrhea, or stomach cramps via the stomach flu, then I HIGHLY suggest you stay away from this place like the plague.

Absolutely terrible service, usually things are slow here but today was ridiculous.  I walked in, and the line was moving so slowly that I just left.  My friends who stayed told me that it took forever for them to get their food.  I don't understand how this place stays in business.   Do not come here if you value your time.

This location is not the best in the LV valley, but the burgers are juicy and made to order. My only complaint is that it is bit over price. Not sure I would ever order the XXXL burger. It might be too much burger if that is even possible.

Hell to the no. This location sucks, and if you don't know, now you know. I waited over 20 minutes for a nasty overpriced chicken sandwich. I know they make everything fresh, but I was the only person there. I have eaten burgers from here before, and they were okay, but I thought I would try something different and go with a chicken sandwich. It was supposed to be a grilled teriyaki chicken, but it was teri-yucky haha. Super salty and not worth the price. I also ordered chili cheese fries, and was given regular fries. Luckily they didn't charge me for the chili fries so I didn't say anything. I don't mind waiting and paying for good food, but this was not good.

Best milkshakes ever!! I would definitely call ahead & order cause the wait is forever which I understand because everything is made to order. The burgers are great though & the milkshakes are made with ice cream!

The veggie burger is the best in town!! Everything else is a little shaky with attitude by the employees and the inability to get orders right at the drive thru. I suggest going inside to order. The prices are also crossed off on the drive thru board so sticker shock of 29 bucks for two shakes, fries, and one veggie one turkey burger. I'll just get the burger next time and make the rest at home.

my first time trying fatburger and it was good but didn't quite live up to the hype. got a babyfat with cheese, eggs, bacon, and grilled onion. i love that you can add eggs to the burger and the price for all the add-ons isn`t bad. the burger patty had a good flavor to it but i think overall i was expected it to have more of a wow factor. maybe jucier or a special sauce? i don`t know

i like that this location is off the strip so probably not as busy. it was pretty empty when we came. but we were in a group of maybe 10-15 people and they messed up (or forgot?) about 4 of our orders. the people at the end of our group ended up waiting days for their orders, having to actually go up to the counter, show their receipts and wait even longer up there. i could see other customers getting their orders with confusion and it seemed like the cooks were getting their orders wrong too? another person in our group placed an order of just french fries and waited a pretty long amount of time for them, then when they finally came out, they were cold!

good burger, not the BEST service/experience. i`d def still eat here again though
I was very disappointed tonight. I ordered through the drive through. Not only was my order incorrect, my burger was cold. I waited 25 minutes in line. There were 5 other cars behind me!

I hope the young adults working here honestly make $15 or more an hour because every time I come though the staff is attentive, and courteous. Never had a problem with my order. My Triple X is always seasoned properly, and cooked to perfection in a timely manner. There should be a tip jar in the drive thru, those cooks are working hard. The meat mixture they're using is flavorful, and has great texture. Fatburger on Flamingo is my go to grub spot.
Good food! I always love the "cook2order" thing.. Fun and friendly but wish they still had the jukebox!

Very friendly staff. The food amazing and the service is excellent. The cook, who's name I didn't get, was very nice and the cashier Jessie has nice sense of humor and gives excellent customer service. Very satisfied with my visit. Thank you.

I feel completely humiliated. I was at your drive through and it took 10 min for someone to acknowledge my I was there. They said they would be right with me. 15 min went by And nothing... cars started honking and couldn't do anything because there was a car in front of me. The car in front of me left and STILL no one asked for my order. I went inside and told them I've been waiting and again no one in your staff said a word. They ignored me like I didn't exist. The car behind me was asking if the store was getting robbed, and they turned off the sound. It was unbelievable...
Food was Delicious!! The cashier was very kind and patient, since I'd never been there I had a couple questions but she answered them all and I was very happy with our order.

I haven't been to Fatburger in about 12 years.... I just went today and man was it good..... I got the XXL burger which is 16 ounces of ground beef and costs about $8.95 with cheese and no fries... It's a little bit of a wait if your going drive thru but it's worth it, the burger is definately one of my favorites and I'll be trying the XXXL burger next time I go which is 24 ounces of burger. Hopefully I can eat it completely.

I'm not sure why I've tried these guys more than once.  The hamburger buns fall apart every time and for the price you would think you are getting a gourmet burger.  I'll stick to Five Guys or Smash Burger.  I have never been impressed with Fatburger.

Great place. Burgers are always correct and delicious. The service isn't that good though. My friend brought in his service dog today and we were stared at the entire time and they all looked scared. It's a dog, not a lion. Calm down. Both times I've been here one specific girl always looked annoyed and like she didn't want to be there. Girl, there are so many people looking for jobs, don't take up space if you don't like it there.

Haven't been to Fatburger in a while, and I remember coming here every now and then when I was younger, so we decided to have brunch here for old time's sake.

First of all, the guy at the drive-thru had no patience. Every time he asked if we wanted something with an order, within 2 seconds of asking his question, he'd rudely say "HELLO?" Secondly, I ordered a sweetened tea, but was given an unsweetened one which the lady gladly exchanged. But when I tasted the new sweetened tea, it literally tasted like sugar and water with no tea flavor whatsoever and barely any hint of color. And lastly, I found a few pieces of wilted lettuce in my chicken sandwich.

The burgers and sandwiches aren't anything special. The only good thing about the meal was the Fat Fries. So overall, the meals are not worth the price. Even my drink was terrible. And an entire additional $1 just to add a slice of cheese to your burger or sandwich? Come on.
Came to fat burger for lunch today and the food was ok not to bad but the price was not rite for the food I received!  Staff was great!

So I love Fatburger every now and then. Decided to get some today. I tried to get one at the Fort Apache and Flamingo location but their computer was down and the AC was out. So I figured ok the Flamingo and Rainbow location is not too far. Well oddly enough their AC was out too. When I had mentioned that they had the same issue as the other store, I was told both locations are the same owner. So that tells me that the AC is not working on because the owner is trying to save money. Really????.

This Fatburger is great. The staff has a heart of gold, a spine of steel. My date and I arrived 20 mins before close on a Thursday (today). There were 2 gentlemen closing and they were taking the order of a large, violent, belligerently drunk group of people.  The people were rude and disrespectful and started cussing at the employees simply because they were too inebriated to communicate. The employees handled it very calmly with complete professionalism, and made my date and I feel very welcome despite the fact that that big group of people started getting violent towards me and my date. The two employees handled themselves very well! They deserve a raise! Thank you BK and Your collegue for excellent service despite anything.
Relieved the food wasn't as bad as our service. Repeated the order twice and twice they confirmed and they still got the order wrong with everything that was ordered.
Great service. There was a big party ahead of us during a slow time. They worked extra quick to get it out and offered an apology. The food was great, as always.

Not busy at all but still took forever to take our order. Dirty but instead of cleaning they were painting the floors right under the customers feet. Also the water fountain doesn't work. All around bad experience and that's coming from someone who loved Fat Burger.

It took 10 minutes for me to receive the food through the drive through. The cost was $15 for a combo, which is a bit pricey in my opinion. Honestly, all the locations are costly and a bit of a wait but the Flamingo location is always slow!

Do not go here. We had a groupon and they deleted it off of our phone and said it wasn't there. They also only had two workers working and were making the sandwiches without gloves on and the person taking our orders had dirty finger nails so I could only imagine what the other guys hands looked like. So we ended up not eating any of the food and just left. They're so disgusting don't go here. I would have left a 0 star review but that's not possible. Also they didn't even say anything to us till about 15 minutes worth of standing there.

You're honestly better off going to mcdonald's. The food is way overpriced, but that's just a corporate issue. The issue with this location is that the restaurant was messy, the drink station looked like it hadn't been wiped down all day. The whole place is kinda dingy and gross. The food was also kinda sloppy. I asked the cashier to ADD grilled onions and yellow peppers to my burger, so naturally i got a burger with nothing but grilled onions and peppers. At this price level, you'd expect a gourmet burger, but it's actually worse than mcdonald's.

This place has the longest drive through ever. I'm the only one in the drive thru ... and the guy says just a min.. it took 10 mins before he get my order then when I went to window another 20 mins more waiting for my order ... they always have short staff only 1 guy is working! 
Horrible service!!  Not many people go there as I pass there  many times a day. I have no clue how they stay open

Don't want to give it a star. Went to drive thru the sign advertised sweet potato fries 1.79 got to window paid receipt showed 4.09 question it and was told board wrong and they refused to adjust. I also order 2 kids meals that came 15.58 for 4 chicken strips total, that was 2 strips each.  Never again that price for subpar food. Burger wasn't that good either. I wanted to try, shame on me. By the way I gave them Back those sweet  fries told the manager/cashier told him false advertising was wrong.
Slow and very dirty tables look like they haven't been cleaned since this morning. Employees very rude...

I am a fan of Fatburger, I've eaten at a few of the different locations around town. This review won't include any whining about prices, it is what it is and you get what you pay for... Frankly if the price is too steep for some people they should just turn around and head down the street to Micky D's or something else they feel is worth the cost...

The issue I have with this location is the service. Yes, Fatburger can be considered fast food so it's foolish to expect much in the way of service. Employees should still be cheery and helpful, and the one that brought our food out was not. She just slapped a pile of trays with all 4 orders on the top one down on the edge of the table and walked away. I'd be more understanding if the place was busy but it was not. I also do not understand why each person's order was not on it's own tray. 

The same employee was less-then-helpful when I informed her that their tea dispenser was out of tea. She told me it was not and that I needed to push the button... which I had done, and nothing but water came out. She then told her coworker that they should check the tea, and walked out the door for her break... 

Like I said, I am not going to bitch about the higher-then-your-typical-fast-food-joint prices, but I will say that if you are going to charge those higher prices your should make sure the people you have taking the money and delivering the product are at least somewhat pleasent to deal with.

More than 30 minutes later and they still had not gotten our order out. We asked about it and all hell broke loose.  The cook thought he had been making it over and over again.  Apparently the order had kept going out the drive through window.  So we never got our food and lots of other customers were getting the wrong food.  Will never be coming back to this one.
I go to this location about once a week (don't judge me), and I've only had great service every time. The employees are always genuinely friendly and the food is good.

Service is very slow, I received my milkshake in the drive-through and my milkshake is almost gone before I've even receive my food. Also everything is WAY overpriced, tastes good but I might as well have gone to a sit down restaurant for what this was worth. Paid $17 for a 1/3lb burger meal smdh

Upon my arrival at this fat burger location I noticed the "Open" sign was on but was greeted in the drive thru with a very unpleasant experience.  The voice I hear is a woman but didn't catch the name. Almost a half hour before closing I am told there is no more orders to be taken because someone right in front of me had placed an order of approximately $200 and they wouldn't have time to make my order.  All I had tried to order was fat fries. Never have I ever been told that I couldn't place an order because someone before me purchased a high volume of items on the menu, especially at a fast food place.  She wasn't kind speaking through the speaker, quick to dismiss  and definitely wasn't very accommodating. My recommendation would be to get staff more qualified to take a high volume of orders or shouldn't have an "Open" sign on if they can not serve food a half hour before closing. I love that this place has a drive thru but safe to say I won't be returning.

I was so looking forward to eating one of my favorite burgers. First time at this location and my favorite burger was 100% ruined. Ordered 5 burgers and boy were they spicy and salty! I couldn't even taste the meat! Even my kids refused to have their burgers! Horrible! The worst ever! Will never come back to this location again!

The staff there are so disrespectful and rude. I went in there to order but wasn't even acknowledged and when I finally tried to order, the staff said they werent making the meal in a very disrespectful way
Ate there last weekend. Cashier was really nice! Great service. Just a warning though the burgers are huge lol. I didn't even finish half.

i like the burgers there dont get me wrong but they are so pricey,i dont go that often but my daughters like them so i went,i got to save my money to go to a fast food joint,pricey................................

It was a good burger. The food was plentiful as the name of the restaurant implies. Rihht now they are doing a limited time offer for a orange Creamsicle milkshake that was out of this world!! I honestly wish the serving was bigger. It was thick and creamy and delicious.
Ordered through Postmates. Delivered on time. 2 out of 3 orders came out wrong. One of them just completely messed up. There was no special instructions. Nothing fancy just some simple burgers.

Amazing workers. My wife and I sat in and were treated with courtesy and smiles. The three guys there were huslting and getting those orders out as quick as they could. Good burgers as always but the owner seriously needs to help these guys out with one more person. Thank you, we wiil be back for more.

OK, I like this place for my selection (as follows):

XL, cheese, grilled onions, egg, and hot sauce (tabasco)

These are salty and fatty...thats why they taste so good to me.

Customer service was excellent. They greeting every customer that came and left the location. Very friendly staff the food was not good. The fries were fresh, but the burgers were dry. I don't know if it was because it was Turkey burger, but I was very dissatisfied. I only tried  this place because it was next to my mechanic. Maybe next time I will try something  different just because of the great customer service.
worse place to get fast food they take tgere sweet ass time.  they litterally don't have nothing ready for u till 30 mins..  never will i go back..

Don't expect anything remotely good from this place. They're the most absolutely disgusting, dry, overlooked crappy patties EVER made!  It's like eating sand, sawdust and meal worms all rolled into one. This is the most sorry pathetic, atrocious excuse for what was written on the menu as a burger.  Voted best burger, MY ASS! That review was from 8 years ago! Definitely don't waste your time or money!!  You'll find something better to eat, I promise.

I always make it a point to get Fatburger at least once when I'm in Vegas. Just ate there and as always the food was great. The fat fries are the best anywhere. Got my usual burger with everything but pickles and it was perfect.  My only complaint is the prices and the long wait, which was strange considering hardly anybody was there at the time.

Ok first off the crew at this location is hard working and cool, my food came out in less then 10m, place is clean. Food was hot and tasty. Plus fat burger is now offering gluten free buns that's great!

My first Fatburger experience! Check that one off my cheeseburgers list.

I was properly warned that it takes quite awhile to get the food, and man were my advisors correct. We pulled up to the drive-thru at around 4 pm and didn't get our food until about 4:27. But that's because they make it fresh, to-order so you're not getting burgers or fries that have been sitting under a heat lamp for God knows how long. And yes, you can taste the freshness in the product. 

Burger was good, fries were even better but the star of the meal had to be the strawberry shake. Cold, creamy and full of berry goodness... it hit the spot on a hot, Vegas afternoon. Normally I don't drink the entire thing, no matter how good, 'cause that's a lot of dairy in one sitting. This time, I absolutely drank it all. 

Fatburger would likely be in my Top 10 all-time burger experiences. It's good and a special treat since we don't have them in the Bay Area. But my heart still stays true to Krekel's Custard in Central IL.

Come here once in a blue moon, decent burger & frys. Unfortunately every time I come here I order a chocolate shake, and it doesn't arrive until after my burger has been devoured.... I think your order should come out all at once shouldn't have to get your drink five minutes later after you finish your meal....I think they need help as well 2 people just don't cut it for this business....

One of the best burgers in Vegas! 

The service was fast and everyone had a nice attitude. They ask if you want everything on the burger or anything removed. I think that is impressive since it's nothing worse than getting a burger and not liking what's on it and picking at it instead of eating it. The burger isn't just a regular patty. It's like they take a handfull of hamburger meat, season it and throw it on the grill. Got a shake with the meal and that was just as tasty! 

I am a new fan of this place!

Don't try to order late night because that crew is lazy and will not take your order. They say they are open until 1am, she said no 12, we gotta clean and we will be her till 1 but you cant get no food.They were rude and unprofessional. This is the second time this happened, first time to complain. I wont be back.

Been going here for years. I've never had a problem with Fatburger or this location. The burgers are always good, yes you may wait a few minutes longer than other fast food places but they make everything fresh to order. I don't eat fast food burgers very often but this Fatburger is one of the places I will go when I hanker for a cheeseburger and I'm close by. (The only other fast food burgers I eat are In n Out and Smashburger)

Three of us went in for lunch and waited more than thirty minutes before we asked for our money back and left. The manager was so disorganized it took nearly ten more minutes to get our money back. 

The kitchen was fighting audibly. They were not busy enough to merit this level of horrible service. 

If I could give an even worse review I would.

Worst Fatbutger location ever, Love the Burger though. 
1- They can't hear the order properly at the drive thru window.
2- Rude and to the point greeting and no smile.
3- Didn't label the burger (had regular, veggie and turkey)

I Love My FOOD everytime here but I work in the same shopping center so I order from them alot and they literally answer the phone maybe 10 % of the time we call to order for pick up everytime!
they are loosing sooooooo much business by not picking up the phone!!! Id be sooooo mad if i owned this location and my employees never pick up the phone!!!

They hear the phone and its never that busy but they never wanna pick it up for some reason even tho alot of people like to call ahead because this is not a fast food joint a good burger takes time!

Cant even imagine how much MONEY this location looses!!!

PHONE CUSTOMER IS THE SAME AS A WALK IN CUSTOMER
 and they both have green money lol smh

A very mixed experience.

This was our first visit to a Fatburger. When we walked in, I initially want sure if we were going to stay.  We were greeted by a stagnant water/ old mop bucket water smell  Additionally, many of the booths needed cleaned.

But as I said, this was our first time so we thought we'd give it a chance.

We ordered a medium burger, sweet potato fries, milkshake, bottled water, XXL burger, skinny fries, fountain drink.  At a burger place, mind you.  I was shocked at the total- $40.19!!!  For two people, at a burger joint 

I thought to myself, this better be a darn good burger for that price!

Our food arrived and looked appetizing. It was freshly made, hot, and our order was accurate.

The burger was good, but not $40 good.  It lacked seasoning and the cheese to meat ratio was lacking.  The skinny fries were crisp and tasty.  I'm normally a huge sweet potato fan, but these I would pass on next time.

So, I would go back to Fatburger if one of my friends were dying to try it; otherwise, there's other better burger joints that are more reasonably priced.

Service was slow, don't go there if you're on lunch break. I ordered 2 chicken sandwiches, poor choice and crazy EXPENSIVE! The cost for 2 sandwiches, and french fries NO DRINKS-$22.00- The chicken was some kind of rubbery processed junk- Dont bother going here! For $22 I could have got food for a week at In-and Out

Used to be a fan, but no longer. $13.55 for the smaller burger, fries, and a soda is outrageous. And the burger  is worse now. Meat not fried hi temp and crusty but tasting almost steamed, and the bun was barely heated and bready instead of hot and toasted. Sad but true. Also no apparent  free parking anymore. Went late and had park in back and hope I didn't get towed. 

The LA founder must be very upset. Not true to the Fat Burger quality and service anymore.

$14 for a small cheeseburger, fries and small drink, which is on the pricey side. The employees are not friendly. They look and act like cholos trying to be professional with oldies music in the background.

Tried for first time tonight, had small burger and skinny fries.burger was burnt and dry, oh so bad.fries were good up there with in and out.But forget the burger.Even adding more ketchup couldn't save this burger.Better off going across the street to Wendy's and getting a .99 cent burger.never will go back again.
Great food again. Burgers were tasty, and fries too. 8:30 PM on a Saturday and the place was empty...WHY? This is a superior hamburger.

$10 burger with some unimpressive guacamole, cheese, and an egg added on. The large burger is quite filling, and honestly, the taste isn't bad, but I think it's a bit overprice, and relative to expectations, a little disappointing.
Easy to get to, friendly staff. This place could use a deep cleaning dirty tabletops, messy self serve area the walls and glass through were covered in dirt and grease.

This review is for this particular location only. Early morning visit approx 3am.

Recent visit:

The service was poor, just a bad experience that nobody should have to endure, especially at 3am. I am the only customer in the drive thru, keep in mind is approx 3am. We spent exactly 24 minutes sitting in the drive thru, yes i took note of the time waiting on our order which was nothing crazy, two burgers, two fries, and two milkshakes which cost us $33.00. 

The service was bad, no apologies for the delay, attitude as if we were bothering them in making them cook at 3am even though they are 24/7. I was way passed pissed when we rolled out of there to say the least! 

Note to DM: The night shift crew needs some customer service skills and time management training. 

I am dissapointed that I have to do a review like this from such a bad experience.

I will give Fatburger another chance, will just avoid this location and the graveyard shift, I won't forget this last visit, just unbelievable! Shame on them!
Food was super on point! But! Lucero, the lady that took my order, was a bit rude and pushy. And! Got my order wrong! Other than that, it was ok.
